functional_zones.bed_zone: Place bed at one end or corner, away from direct view of entrance.
functional_zones.work_zone: Place desk near window for natural light.
functional_zones.living_zone: Cluster sofa, coffee table, rug in center or near window/TV.
functional_zones.storage_zone: Place storage units along walls, near entrance or unused corners.

circulation.entrance_to_bed: Maintain at least 60cm clear path from entrance to bed.
circulation.entrance_to_kitchen: Maintain at least 60cm clear path from entrance to kitchen.

privacy.use_furniture_as_partition: Bookshelf, sofa, or partition can be used to separate bed from living area.
